name: politico
text: Many of the people emerging as powerful national leaders right now are black women – and that could shake up Joe Biden's VP race. He promised to nominate a woman; now, he’s also reportedly looking for a woman with a strong record on social justice. https://t.co/AtvzpdFoab

text: Gov. Gavin Newsom calls for California to ban a police head restraint technique as demonstrations continue over the death of George Floyd https://t.co/9kQuJbdQJz

text: House Democrats are ripping into Pentagon leaders' refusal to testify on the use of military to repsond to protests: “Apparently, the Trump Administration believes they have no obligation to explain their actions to Congress” https://t.co/dZq8y5FoWD

name: politico
text: With little public attention and lax oversight, America's civilian federal law enforcement ranks have surged since 9/11 – growing by roughly 2,500 officers annually every year since 2000 https://t.co/PLrukz601M
